text: Taj Joyo (original name Taj Mohammad Joyo) () is a writer of the Sindhi language. He was born on 6 September 1954 in village Peer Kolachi taulka Sakrand Shaheed Benazirabad District, Sindh. ==Professional career== He became a teacher in 22 October 1972. He remained Secretary of Sindhi Language Authority Sindh, 04 times Secretary General of Sindhi Adabi Sangat Sindh. ==References== Category:Pakistani poets Category:Sindhi-language poets Category:Sindhi people Category:1930 births Category:Living people
title: Taj Joyo
